Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Riverdell Way, just north of the Allakaren Circle.
Room.LongDescription: The Allakaren Circle, to the south, runs around the interesting and unique Tree of Life. Although no special properties have very been obtained from the tree itself, the tree has survived centuries of wars, famines, droughts and various other disasters. The Circle is a monument for the preservation of such a magnificent tree.
